TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract RibbonOfficeMenu implements class Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComponent, class System.ComponentModel.IComponent, class System.IDisposable

summary.span: 提供对添加到 Microsoft Office 菜单的控件的访问。

span.span: Provides access to controls that you add to the Microsoft Office Menu.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将 "**功能区 (可视化设计器)** " 项添加到项目时, Visual Studio 会自动将新的对象分配给生成的接口的属性。When you add a **Ribbon (Visual Designer)** item to your project, Visual Studio automatically assigns a new object to the property of the generated interface. 使用此对象在运行时将新控件添加到 Microsoft Office 菜单, 或访问已添加到 Microsoft Office 菜单的控件。Use this object to add new controls to the Microsoft Office Menu at run time, or to access controls that you added to the Microsoft Office Menu. 可以在运行时添加控件, 但只能在加载功能区之前添加控件。You can add controls at run time, but only before the Ribbon is loaded. 创建控件的实例, 然后将新控件添加到集合中。Create an instance of the control, and then add the new control to the collection. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview)。For more information, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview). [!INCLUDE[vsto_interface](~/includes/vsto-interface-md.md)] ## 用法Usage [!INCLUDE[vsto_net35mref](~/includes/vsto-net35mref-md.md)] ## Examples 下面的示例循环访问功能区 Office 菜单上的自定义控件并显示其名称。The following example iterates through the custom controls on the Ribbon Office menu and displays their name. 若要运行此代码示例, 必须首先执行以下步骤:To run this code example, you must first perform the following steps: 1. 向 Office 项目添加 "**功能区 (可视化设计器)** " 项。Add a **Ribbon (Visual Designer)** item to an Office project. 2. 向 "Microsoft Office" 按钮添加一个按钮。Add a button to the Microsoft Office Button. 3. 将按钮的 " **(Name)** " 属性设置`myOfficeMenuButton`为。Set the **(Name)** property of the button to `myOfficeMenuButton`. 4. 将**PositionType**属性设置为 "**位置**" 属性下的 " **AfterOfficeID** "。Set the **PositionType** property to **AfterOfficeID** under the **Position** property. 5. 将**OfficeID**属性设置为 "**位置**" 属性下的 " **FilePrintMenu** "。Set the **OfficeID** property to **FilePrintMenu** under the **Position** property. [!code-csharp[Trin_Ribbon_ControlProperties#15](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_Ribbon_ControlProperties/CS/Ribbon1.cs#15)] [!code-vb[Trin_Ribbon_ControlProperties#15](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_Ribbon_ControlProperties/VB/Ribbon1.vb#15)]

summary.span: 获取添加到 Microsoft Office 菜单的功能区控件。

span.span: Gets the Ribbon controls that you added to the Microsoft Office Menu.

value.span: 在设计时或运行时添加到 Microsoft Office 菜单的功能区控件集合。

span.span: The collection of Ribbon controls that you added to the Microsoft Office Menu at design time or run time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以在运行时添加控件, 但只能在加载功能区之前添加控件。You can add controls at run time, but only before the Ribbon is loaded. 创建控件的实例, 然后将新控件添加到集合中。Create an instance of the control, and then add the new control to the collection. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview)。For more information, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview). 使用功能区设计器将控件添加到 Microsoft Office 菜单时, Visual Studio 会自动将控件添加到属性。When you add controls to the Microsoft Office Menu by using the Ribbon Designer, Visual Studio automatically adds the controls to the property.

exception.span: 加载功能区后，尝试添加、移除或替换 。

span.span: You try to add, remove, or replace a after the Ribbon is loaded.
